name: Teachings of Justice
desc:
The sword of the Nation of Water is justice.

The law of Fontaine walks with the sword of justice in hand. Without the guidance of justice, all law is reduced to meaningless words, to be tampered with and slaughtered at a whim.

customize.name: Parametric Transformer
customize.desc:
A device that can transmute materials placed within and convert it into some other material.
·During the transmutation process, you must use Elemental Attacks to generate enough energy for the transmutation to take place.
·After obtaining the transmuted materials, you must wait seven days to use it once again.

This mysterious device, discovered within the ruins, has the power to accelerate cycles and "transmute" material objects. Generally speaking, everything is undergoing a cycle. Memories and elements surge within the ley lines, rotten fallen fruits return to the soil, and the trees born from the soil will one day bear their crystalline fruit...

customize.name: Clorinde
customize.desc: An undefeated Champion Duelist. Sword in hand, she defends justice in the Court of Fontaine.

customize.name: Furina
customize.desc: The absolute focus of the stage of judgment, until the final applause sounds.

customize.name: Freminet
customize.desc: A reserved young man who is well-versed in diving. Beneath his distant, icy demeanor lies a pure heart bereft of all flaws.

customize.name: Guide to Justice
customize.desc:
The sword of the Nation of Water is justice.

The law of Fontaine walks with the sword of justice in hand. Justice must be blind, and those who wield the sword of justice must not be led astray by their own interests or affairs.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

The law of Fontaine walks with the sword of justice in hand. Without the guidance of justice, all law is reduced to meaningless words, to be tampered with and slaughtered at a whim.

The law of Fontaine walks with the sword of justice in hand. Justice must be blind, and those who wield the sword of justice must not be led astray by their own interests or affairs.

customize.name: Philosophies of Justice
customize.desc:
The sword of the Nation of Water is justice.

The law of Fontaine walks with the sword of justice in hand. Justice means judgment and reconciliation, the blade of judgment arrests the actions of evil, while reconciliation maintains order.
